definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: Variation of afterload influenced not only early, but also late diastolic filling parameters.
sentences.chinese: 後負荷變化影響舒張早期及心房收縮期左室充盈。

sentences.english: Heat had effect on diastolic pressure antagonistic with noise.
sentences.chinese: 高溫對舒張壓的作用爲拮抗效應。

sentences.english: These rhythmic waves of muscular relaxation and contraction are called peristalsis .
sentences.chinese: 這種肌肉舒張和收縮的有節律波動稱爲蠕動。

sentences.english: With the intensification of left ventricular hypertrophy, the LVDF decreased further.
sentences.chinese: 且隨着左室肥厚的加重，舒張功能進一步減退。

sentences.english: The mitral annulus was more planar and elliptical in systole than in diastole.
sentences.chinese: 其形態於收縮期較舒張期更爲橢圓。

sentences.english: The detraction of systolic and diastolic function of right heart of .
sentences.chinese: 捉示窒息嬰兒右心收縮和舒張功能受損。

sentences.english: Automatically locates the end systolic and end diastolic frames.
sentences.chinese: 自動定位收縮和舒張末結束幀。

sentences.english: The diastolic blood flow of grafted IMA markedly increased postoperatively.
sentences.chinese: IMA移植後舒張期血流明顯增加。

sentences.english: During transient preload reduction, the diastolic stiffness constant was measured directly.
sentences.chinese: 在短暫前負荷減少時，直接測量出舒張期僵硬度常數。

sentences.english: Deflates too slowly causes forearm extravasated blood, creates the diastolic pressure reading to advance.
sentences.chinese: 放氣太慢則使前臂淤血，造成舒張壓讀數增高。

sentences.english: The main character of muscle fatigue is the reduction of muscle relaxing ability.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉舒張能力的降低是肌肉疲勞的主要特徵之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion TMLR can improve the systolic and diastolic function of heart.
sentences.chinese: 結論TMLR可以改善心臟收縮和舒張功能。

sentences.english: Stenting in the early stage of AMI can improve the contracting and diastole function markedly.
sentences.chinese: AMI急性期支架術明顯改善左室收縮及舒張功能。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of phase analysis by mitral annular movement in assessment of left ventricular diastolic function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討二尖瓣環時相評估左室舒張功能的臨牀意義。

sentences.english: Conclusions In later pregnancy, left cardiovascular diastole function slightly decreases.
sentences.chinese: 結論正常妊娠母體孕晚期舒張功能輕度減低。

sentences.english: Systole presses heighten , diastolic pressure drops , pressing of arteries and veins also increases accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 收縮壓增高，舒張壓下降，脈壓也相應增大。

definition: to stagnate/to congeal/(fig.) to stop still/to freeze
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
body palpation (diagnostic method in TCM)/tactile examination
